Text: O Jihofa, ugbo-mi, nafe̩do̩-we̩ dabo̩ta.
Jihofa chʼokuta-mi kpai aku-mi kpai e̩ne̩ ki aje̩ ñw mi futane̩,
Nakwado̩ Jihofa, e-ki dukpe̩ ku ma je̩nyʼu,
Iku uku wenyʼumi,
iku o̩jegu chewenyʼumi,
U do̩ Jihofa ef ope̩cha-mi;
Tak ile̩ kwo miejo i la ga ligaliga;
Odudu kwef iñmo̩-wñ dufu tʼate̩,
I ño̩ fʼefojale efojale hi wane̩, tak i mugwo̩ru wa;
I la tanʼoj iche̩rub ale, i la wu;
I mʼe̩chubi du chʼuña ugbo kʼi amaja,
Ane̩ ki mune̩ foo o̩gba-wñ oñ akpa ki jukpa le̩ lale okuto̩mo̩jo̩cha kpai e̩ge̩ una.
Uko̩la Jihofa laño̩ chʼakpabana efojale,
I la kʼo̩fa-wñ kpuche̩ dufu, oñ i fʼuma kpatuka;
Tak ugbo unefu omiofo kwotejugede,
I fʼuche̩ kpe̩ kwʼatate̩, i mʼumi du,
I gba mi bʼo̩wo̩ e̩nebi-mi ki gbiti te̩,
Ma lewa bʼumi ma o̩jo̩ uchobi-mi;
I ño̩ dʼumi dufu tef uña ki nʼabe̩;
Jihofa fʼo̩me̩ ra ñw mi alu kʼo̩kpakpa-mi de̩;
Todu omi fʼo̩na o̩na Jihofa de me̩,
Todu oj ajo̩-wñ kʼi ka jʼo̩gba-mi chaka,
Omi ño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ogbolo ugbo-wñ,
Todule̩ Jihofa mʼakoji-wñ du ñw mi alu kʼo̩kpakpa-mi de̩,
Uwe̩ añʼe̩numo̩la ka kʼuwe̩ chʼe̩numo̩la,
uwe̩ añʼe̩ne̩ ki de̩ yaala ka kʼuwe̩ de̩ yaala;
Uwe̩ la ajadu ame̩no̩bata;
Todu uwe̩ adʼuna tʼagege-mi;
Todu lugbo we̩ oñ omi rale gu ef udala du;
I chʼe-O̩jo̩—o̩na-wñ mufu;
Todu e̩ne̩ chʼO̩jo̩ ki ma che Jihofa n?
owñ chʼO̩jo̩ kʼi dʼukpahiu lʼago-mi de,
I aje̩ ñw e̩re̩-mi le̩ dab e̩re̩ e̩labikolo̩,
I ako̩ o̩wo̩-mi ogu eja,
Uwe̩ laño̩ mʼugbe̩yo̩ ujadu-we̩ du ñw mi me̩,
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw ugbo kʼe̩re̩-mi atane̩ ki nʼabe̩,
U ranʼame̩nebi-mi oñ u fʼuma mu;
U gwo ma da, ma ño̩ neke kwane̩ ge̩ n;
Todu uwe̩ dʼukpahiu jʼumi iñmi tod ogu le̩;
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw ame̩nebi-mi mʼubi dagbʼomi,
Ma kwa, ma muda nʼe̩ne̩ du ki ajadu ma n,
U fʼuma gwu nuku nuku dab ebutu kʼafu ako alo;
Uwe̩ mʼumi gba bʼef iñwa amone̩ te̩ me̩;
Egbo̩ kʼama gbʼinabali-mi ababa, ma gbʼomu-mi gbo̩;
Abononojo agbo rinyo̩,
Jihofa deju; okuta-mi ki nʼele,
owñ chʼO̩jo̩ ki fʼache̩-mi na
kʼi gba mi kwʼo̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-mi;
Todule̩ nagogbodʼuwe̩ ef abo uche̩ ichi uche̩ichi, O Jihofa,
Ujadu inaina i ako ñw onu-wñ,
